section.title: Element: Namespace
section.simpara: This is the main root element of most of the passes. It is designed to contain both tokens and regular code.

formalpara.title: Namespace Content
formalpara.para: A namespace can contain any number of Line, Expression, Function, or FuncExpr elements in any order.

formalpara.title: Namespace Attributes
formalpara.para: The name attribute should contain the value, if any, of the name of the namespace listed in the program.
